title: "I Do"  15 Years Of Wedding Misadventures
description: 15 years of memories from 1,400+ weddings as a professional videographer. There are plenty of entertaining stories to share with the readers!Chapter titles include:* Where's Grandma?* Can I Get Your Autograph?* Who Brought the Gun?* Calisthenics in Formal Wear"This book is a page-turner! Once you pick it up, you won't be able to put it down until you're done!"Complete Bridal Planning Checklist Included“After reading this book, I’m thrilled that my wedding was so ‘average’.”“Absolutely hilarious! This is the strategic, guerrilla handbook to planning a successful wedding.”"This book is a MUST READ for anyone who is planning on getting married or has already taken the trip down the aisle!"
author: Kiersten Hall
